content: purple pansy designs page 1 pattern notes have a heart valentine socks sizes childs medium by denise bein kroll cm / large cluster women s medium am /large al instructions for cluster/am/al are given in parenthesis gauge 30 st / 42 row per 4 10cm measurements circumference 6 25 /7 25 /8 5/9 5 length adjustable yarn knitpicks stroll fingering black and white 20-30g /150 yds directions each with red/cc2 cast on 48 56/64/72 stitches using the long-tail or other regia 4 ply extra twist stretchy cast on join to work in the round beware of twisting merino fingering red 10-20g / 41 yards ribbing *k2 p2 repeat from * to end needles us 1 2 25mm work ribbing for 8 10/10/12 rounds or to desired length notions scissors join white/mc and begin working in stripe pattern join black/cc1 when darning needle tape needed measure stripe pattern abbreviations with white/mc knit 3 rounds s1 slip one stitch purl- with black/cc1 knit 1 round wise with yarn in back ssk slip slip knit work chart for 7 rounds motif is repeated 6 7/8/9 times around leg cut k2tog knit two red/cc2 yarn the chart rounds continue the stripe pattern as set so the together p2tog purl two next round worked will be black/cc1 together repeat stripe pattern until 24 36 rounds have been completed additional stripe rounds ending with black/cc1 can be worked if a longer sock is desired heel set up continuing in black/cc1 turn work and purl across 24 28/32/36 stitches copyright 2019 denise bein kroll / purple pansy designs this is a free pattern you are welcome to knit this pattern for personal use gifts or k1 repeat from * to end chart row 2 ws s1 purl to end repeat these two row until 24 28/32/36 stitches have been worked or length needed for fit heel turn set up rs s1 knit 13 15/18/19 ssk k1 turn ws s1 purl 5 5/7/7 p2tog p1 turn row 1 rs s1 knit to 1 stitch before gap ssk k1 turn row 2 ws s1 purl to 1 stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn - note on the 2 smaller sizes the last repeat will have only one stitch on either side of the gap omit the k1/p1 before the turn on this row repeat these two row until all stitches have been worked 14 16/20/22 stitches remain cut black/cc1 gusset set up with white/mc knit across instep stitches pick up 14 15/18/19 stitches along first side of heel flap knit across heel stitches pick up 14 15/18/19 stitches along other side of heel flap an extra stitch may be picked on each side up to close gap at instep if necessary decrease round continue working in stripe pattern as set join black/cc1 when needed
